definition: to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: For example, my mispronunciation of her name could have been a fatal mistake.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，我念錯她的姓名可能是最大的錯誤。

sentences.english: For example, one week you might bring in muffins for no reason.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，這周你可以從家帶些鬆餅與同事分享。

sentences.english: Painting with watercolors is quite different from painting with oils, for example.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，水彩畫和油畫有很大不同。

sentences.english: Shiites are largely barred from the police force, for example, and from the military.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，什葉派基本不能擔任警察或者進入軍隊。

sentences.english: Turnitin, for example, is a Web site that offers a service to identify papers that contain copied material.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，即網站提供對含有複製材料的鑑定服務。

sentences.english: Think back, for example, to how we used to buy music.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，回想我們以前是如何購買音樂唱片的呢。

sentences.english: For instance, can you describe accurately the faces of five good friends?
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，你能準確地描繪出五個好朋友的臉形嗎？

sentences.english: For example, the word "shampoo" for soap for the hair came from India.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，單詞“洗髮水”爲肥皂，毛將焉來自印度。

sentences.english: For example, consider the task of resending a message.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，考慮重發一個消息的任務。

sentences.english: Car-owners, for example, pay no car or road tax.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，當前車主不需要繳納車稅或路稅。

sentences.english: For example, children could rinse out their wet nightclothes .
sentences.chinese: 上面舉例來說，孩子可以清洗外面的他們溼氣睡衣。

sentences.english: For instance, find the common ground between your needs and their wants.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，找到您的需求和他們的願望的共同點。

sentences.english: The odds of getting endometritis, for example, can be reduced by spaying.
sentences.chinese: 的機率越來越子宮內膜炎，舉例來說，可以減少噴塗。

sentences.english: The food on some high-speed trains, for instance, could certainly be made better, he said.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，在一些高鐵上的食物當然可能作得更好。

sentences.english: For example, last year the Russian air force took possession of one new aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，去年俄空軍得到了一種新型戰機。

sentences.english: As an example, research on rapeseed has shown great potential for improved yield and profit.
sentences.chinese: 舉例來說，油菜研究表明了巨大的增產增收潛力。

definition: to take action/to adopt policies/to move on some issue
to make a choice (between several alternatives)/a choice/an option/an alternative
to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
to owe a debt/the sum owed
range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
